name: FS Certificate Portfolio
description: Collection of assignment projects completed during the full stack program.
source: Full Stack Software Development (2025, UT Austin + Great Learning)

name: Legacy Portfolio Website
description: Created with HTML, CSS3, and JavaScript, originally based on a project tutorial during the IBM Introduction to Web Development course on edX.org. I changed the layout, contents, and style, adding buttons, icons, and fonts. It is still a work in progress.

name: Calculator
description: Developed and styled a single-page website for metric to imperial unit conversion using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS3. I merged it with another project, a simple interest calculator.

name: Java Projects
description: Created an application to solve different Java problems with a shared parser class. Still refactoring and adding problem classes.

name: Codewars Kata
description: Developed short Java programs to solve scenarios created by other users.
